entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Ivujivik
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:22 PM EST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -32.2°C
entry.summary:

Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 35.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 35. Wind chill minus 43 this evening and minus 52 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High minus 29.

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 31.
